    (hs : s.topological_closure = «expr⊤») : (s.map (f : «expr →ₛₗ[ ] » M₁ σ₁₂ M₂)).topological_closure = «expr⊤» :=
  by

  simp only [submodule.topological_closure_coe, submodule.top_coe, ← dense_iff_closure_eq] at hs⊢

theorem to_ring_inverse (e : «expr ≃L[ ] » M R M₂) (f : «expr →L[ ] » M R M₂) :

    dsimp

/-- Let `R` be a topological ring such that zero is not an isolated point (e.g., a nontrivially

theorem module.punctured_nhds_ne_bot [nontrivial M] [ne_bot (nhds_within.ne (0 : R))] [NoZeroSMulDivisors R M] (x : M) :

  rcases exists_ne (0 : M) with ⟨y, hy⟩
  suffices : tendsto (fun c : R => x + «expr • » c y) (nhds_within.ne 0) (nhds_within.ne x); exact this.ne_bot
  refine' tendsto.inf _ (tendsto_principal_principal.2 <| _)
  · convert tendsto_const_nhds.add ((@tendsto_id R _).smul_const y)
    rw [zero_smul, add_zero]
  · intro c hc

theorem has_continuous_smul.of_nhds_zero [topological_ring R] [topological_add_group M]
    (hmul : tendsto (fun p : R × M => «expr • » p.1 p.2) (filter.prod ((nhds) 0) ((nhds) 0)) ((nhds) 0))
    (hmulleft : ∀ m : M, tendsto (fun a : R => «expr • » a m) ((nhds) 0) ((nhds) 0))
    (hmulright : ∀ a : R, tendsto (fun m : M => «expr • » a m) ((nhds) 0) ((nhds) 0)) : has_continuous_smul R M :=
  ⟨by
    rw [continuous_iff_continuous_at]
    rintro ⟨a₀, m₀⟩
    have key :
      ∀ p : R × M,
        «expr • » p.1 p.2 =
          «expr • » a₀ m₀ + («expr • » (p.1 - a₀) m₀ + «expr • » a₀ (p.2 - m₀) + «expr • » (p.1 - a₀) (p.2 - m₀)) :=
      by
      rintro ⟨a, m⟩
      simp [sub_smul, smul_sub]
      abel
    rw [funext key]
    clear key
    refine' tendsto_const_nhds.add (tendsto.add (tendsto.add _ _) _)

/-- If `M` is a topological module over `R` and `0` is a limit of invertible elements of `R`, then
`⊤` is the only submodule of `M` with a nonempty interior.

theorem submodule.eq_top_of_nonempty_interior' [ne_bot (nhds_within { x : R | is_unit x } 0)] (s : submodule R M)
    (hs : (interior (s : set M)).nonempty) : s = «expr⊤» :=
  by
  rcases hs with ⟨y, hy⟩
  refine' submodule.eq_top_iff'.2 fun x => _
  rw [mem_interior_iff_mem_nhds] at hy
  have :
    tendsto (fun c : R => y + «expr • » c x) (nhds_within { x : R | is_unit x } 0) ((nhds) (y + «expr • » (0 : R) x)) :=
    tendsto_const_nhds.add ((tendsto_nhds_within_of_tendsto_nhds tendsto_id).smul tendsto_const_nhds)
  rw [zero_smul, add_zero] at this
  obtain ⟨_, hu : y + «expr • » _ _ ∈ s, u, rfl⟩ :=
    nonempty_of_mem (inter_mem (mem_map.1 (this hy)) self_mem_nhds_within)
  have hy' : y ∈ ↑s := mem_of_mem_nhds hy
  rwa [s.add_mem_iff_right hy', ← Units.smul_def, s.smul_mem_iff' u] at hu
